name: Quit Smoking VR Therapist
description:
Quit Smoking VR Therapist is an application that can help you get rid of cigarette addiction with ease and without stress. Based on the latest knowledge in the field of psychology, neuroscience and hypnotherapy, it will simplify the path to life without smoking in the environment of virtual reality.

Prior to using the application, relax for a couple of minutes, do not let anyone or anything disturb you. The application is most effective in a state of deep relaxation. For the best and fastest result, we recommend reusing the application several times a week.

The application is not suitable for people who are sensitive to bright white and for people with epilepsy.
